title: Memorandum on Revisions to the 2017 Unified Command Plan â€“ The White House
content:
Presidential Memoranda			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
May 24, 2019
Pursuant to my authority as Commander in Chief, I hereby approve and direct the implementation of the revised Unified Command Plan.Consistent with section 161(b)(2) of title 10, United States Code, and section 301 of title 3, United States Code, you are directed to notify the Congress on my behalf.You are authorized and directed to publish this memorandum in the Federal Register.DONALD J. TRUMP
